title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 6.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 6.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Accident and health insurance company shall have the meaning set forth in Insurance Law section 107(a)(1). (b) Article 43 corporation means a corporation organized pursuant to Insurance Law Article 43. (c) Insurer means an insurer authorized to do an insurance business in this State, including an Article 43 corporation and a health maintenance organization. (d) Life insurance company shall have the meaning set forth in Insurance Law section 107(a)(28). (e) NAIC means the National Association of Insurance Commissioners. (f) SERFF means the NAIC's System for Electronic Rates and Forms Filing or any system designated by the superintendent as substantially similar. (g) Filer means an insurer or other person or entity required to make a filing with or submission to the superintendent. Notes

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 5/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
